oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Surgery for the Urine Pooling Cow
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hull, Bruce L.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: urine pooling
surgery
pathology
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Before considering surgery for the urine pooler one must first understand why urine pooling is detrimental and what constitutes a diagnosis of a urine pooler. Doing surgery for a urine pooler is of no benefit if the cow has other pathology which is causing her infertility unless these other problems are treated concurrently or in place of urine pooler surgery.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1989; 12-13
